revised_title: Research and Development in the Man-Made Fibre Industry: The Courtaulds Limited Research Department
tldr: The article describes the Research Department of Courtaulds Limited, a company specializing in the production of man-made fibres. It discusses the various industrial processes involved in producing continuous filament yarns and staple fibres, focusing on the challenges and techniques used in the viscose and cellulose acetate production processes. The article also outlines the organization of the research department, its facilities, and its role in developing new fibres and improving existing ones.
